title: Track Personnel on Site
description: During an emergency drill, a safety officer needs to get a headcount of all personnel at the designated muster points.

tasks.description: Access the site access control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent opens the personnel tracking dashboard.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all personnel who badged into the site today.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows 250 people are currently on site.

tasks.description: Use the system to check off personnel as they arrive at the muster points, identifying anyone who is still unaccounted for.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs the roll call and the system shows 248 people are accounted for, with 2 still missing.
